Our reviews may contain information about various aspects of gambling but are intended for informational purposes only. 18+ 18- Casino de Monte-Carlo Open every day: Visits from 10 a.m. to 1 p.m. Games rooms from 2 p.m. “Nothing can be done here like anywhere else,” said François Blanc, its founder. With its James Bond atmosphere and Belle Époque architecture, the Monte-Carlo Casino remains a benchmark in Europe and the world in the field of games and entertainment. An exceptional range of games... French Roulette, English Roulette, Punto Banco, Black Jack, Craps and Poker Texas Hold'em Ultimate: novice and experienced players try their hand at table games under the warm light of bohemian crystal chandeliers. Luck can also smile on slot machine fans in the Renaissance Room or the Touzet Salons. Unique know-how... Here, everything is worked with care and finesse to offer a remarkable immersion in the world of the casino. Unique, the gaming tables are made by craftsmen in the workshops of the Société des Bains de Mer. As for the croupiers, they provide the best services and know how to make all players benefit from their unparalleled know-how. Games and much more... Very seasoned players or more novices, everyone can find what they are looking for here: entertainment, thrills, strong emotions and surprise! Pl. du Casino, 98000 Monaco Visit site Casino Café de Paris Innovation, modernity and comfort Open every day from 10 a.m. for slot machines and from 4 p.m. for gaming tables*. If the 480 state-of-the-art slot machines make the Casino Café de Paris a success, table games and electronic games electrify the atmosphere to make it the most innovative establishment in the resort. A generous and sparkling casino, open every day. In slot machine paradise... Permanently bustling, the Casino Café de Paris offers its players the largest range of slot machines, sometimes exclusively in Europe. Table games are not left out: Black Jack, English Roulette and Poker Texas Hold'em Ultimate. Aficionados meet there and try their luck: an irresistible playground for adrenaline enthusiasts. Innovation at the heart of the experience... In addition to the most incredible slot machines, the Casino Café de Paris offers indoor gaming tables and on its two smoking terraces depending on the season: ideal for trying your luck and have a drink while admiring the Casino gardens. The welcome is always careful and warm. The staff takes great care of each of its customers' needs. A generous casino... With the largest jackpots on the Côte d'Azur sometimes reaching a million, the Casino Café de Paris seduces with many advantages in its contemporary decor. Enthusiasts and beginners alike can enter the game through the Monte-Carlo style front door! * Presentation of a valid passport or national identity document (for EU nationals) is required to enter the casino. Pl. du Casino, 98000 Monaco Visit site Sun Casino Located just a few steps from the Monte Carlo Casino, the Sun Casino is the real Las Vegas of the Principality. This establishment is located in the heart of the luxurious Fairmont Monte-Carlo Hotel. The Société des Bains de Mer presents it as "Monaco's most American casino." The warm atmosphere and universal luxury around really transport you mentally to America. The casino has no less than three hundred table games: English roulette, craps, blackjack... Sun Casino is valued not only for its variety of gaming opportunities, but also for its many shows and entertainment. The casino also offers one-hour introductory blackjack lessons starting from €100 per person. Good to know: Sun Casino became part of the Café de Paris casino and closed in 2023. 12 Av. des Spélugues, 98000 Monaco Visit site Blackjack Black Jack is played against the bank with the aim of drawing a total of points as close as possible to 21, without exceeding it. To determine your total, know that cards from two to nine have their face value. English Roulette The roulette table has 37 numbers: from 0 to 36. You must guess the winning number. That is to say the square where the white ball will fall after the rotation of the cylinder. Slot machines You win at Slot Machines when you line up the same symbols on one of the paylines. Ultimate Texas Hold'em Poker The objective of the game is to get a better combination than the dealer. Electronic roulette The rules of electronic roulette are identical to those of traditional roulette. Terrace Games Our open-air play areas welcome you all year round and ensure optimal comfort. Place du Casino After several months of renovations, the Place du Casino has finally revealed its new look—a modern, open space entirely redesigned to accommodate visitors. And with spring now upon us, this beating heart of the Principality is the perfect place for a lovely stroll, where you can enjoy the impressive architecture, the high-end shopping, and the delicious food. #1 A new look for a legendary square A wonderful surprise awaits anyone returning to the legendary Place du Casino. Gone is the famous “camembert”, as the locals affectionately called it. The grassy knoll that previously occupied a good portion of the space has been replaced with an elegant beige-stoned esplanade, which offers a clear view of the lavish Belle Époque buildings in the area, including the Hôtel de Paris Monte-Carlo, the Café de Paris Monte-Carlo and the Casino de Monte-Carlo. The architect of this transformation is landscape designer Michel Desvigne, who was previously known for redesigning the Boulingrins Gardens. His new square embraces the old, evoking its original look from 1850. The Sky Mirror by Anish Kapoor, a fixture of the old square, remains at the centre of the esplanade, surrounded by a circular fountain designed like a small oasis. And with the flatter terrain, it now reflects the elegant silhouette of the Hôtel de Paris Monte-Carlo. Enjoy the view... #2 New palm trees, for a taste of summer year-round To retain a touch of greenery, the new Place du Casino features an elegant row of twenty palm trees. Just like the trees on the hotel patio, the palms can be entirely relocated for a concert or festival thanks to a system of removable paving stones. Next time you’re out for a walk, take some time to imagine this square transformed for some extravagant event—the kind that only Monaco knows how to throw. #3 Relax, sit back and take in the vibes While the square is soon open to pedestrians, its new design still leaves room for vehicle traffic—especially along the Hôtel de Paris Monte-Carlo, where the legendary Formula 1 Grand Prix track has been left intact. Parking spaces, meanwhile, have naturally been maintained, which means that residents and guests alike can continue the time-honoured tradition of admiring the country’s most stylish vehicles under the Monegasque sun. Meanwhile, at the Café de Paris Monte-Carlo, the surrounding space is reserved for pedestrians, giving the terrace an appreciable calm. Soon we’ll all get to go back there for a lovely chat with friends, a bit of coffee, or a nice snack... #4 One Monte-Carlo & the Boulingrins Gardens: take some time for yourself While the new Place du Casino is undeniably the beating heart of Monaco, it’s also the ideal starting point for a shopping spree into the brand-new One Monte-Carlo district. An extraordinary venue also offering a conference centre designed for your professional and private events. The good news is that the country’s high-end shops will be re-opening their doors on 5 May. Cartier, Chanel, Dior, Hermès…feel free to browse around and treat yourself to something nice. After all, you’ve earned it. And when you’re done, why not take some time for a lovely stroll along the lusciously green Boulingrins Gardens? Our reviews may contain information about various aspects of gambling but are intended for informational purposes only. 18+ 18- Casino in Monaco Monaco is known for its luxurious lifestyle and extravagant entertainment options, and one of the main attractions in this small principality are its world-renowned casinos. In fact, Monaco is home to three famous casinos: Casino de Monte-Carlo, Place du Casino, and Casino Café de Paris. Casino de Monte-Carlo is perhaps the most iconic and glamorous of the three. It was established in 1863 and has been featured in numerous movies and books, becoming a symbol of luxury and opulence. The casino is located in the heart of Monte Carlo and is a must-visit destination for anyone looking to experience the thrill of high-stakes gambling in a lavish setting. The casino offers a wide range of games, including roulette, blackjack, poker, and slot machines. The interior of the casino is beautifully decorated with crystal chandeliers, ornate frescoes, and intricate tapestries, creating an atmosphere of sophistication and elegance. Visitors are required to dress elegantly and adhere to a strict dress code, adding to the exclusivity of the experience. In addition to its gaming facilities, Casino de Monte-Carlo also hosts a variety of events and shows, making it a popular entertainment destination for both locals and tourists. Whether you want to try your luck at the tables or simply soak in the glamorous atmosphere, Casino de Monte-Carlo is sure to impress. Place du Casino is a famous square located in the heart of Monte Carlo, Monaco. It is surrounded by luxurious casinos, high-end shops, and elite restaurants, making it a popular destination for tourists and locals alike. The most iconic feature of Place du Casino is the Casino de Monte-Carlo, a stunning building that dates back to the 19th century. It has been featured in numerous films and serves as a symbol of luxury and glamour. The square is also home to the Hôtel de Paris Monte-Carlo, a historic hotel known for its opulent decor and world-class service. In addition to the casinos and hotels, Place du Casino is also known for its upscale dining options. Visitors can enjoy gourmet cuisine at restaurants such as Le Louis XV - Alain Ducasse à l'Hôtel de Paris, which has been awarded three Michelin stars. Throughout the year, Place du Casino hosts a variety of events, including festivals and concerts. The square is a popular spot for performers and artists, with live music often filling the air. Visitors can enjoy outdoor concerts, dance performances, and other cultural events in this beautiful setting. Despite its luxurious surroundings, Place du Casino is open to the public and welcomes visitors of all ages. The square offers a mix of history, culture, and entertainment, making it a must-visit destination for anyone traveling to Monaco. Overall, Place du Casino is a vibrant and exciting square that captures the essence of Monte Carlo. With its stunning architecture, world-class amenities, and lively atmosphere, it is a true gem in the heart of the principality. Whether you're looking to try your luck at the casino or simply soak in the ambiance, Place du Casino offers something for everyone. Casino Café de Paris is the third casino in Monaco and is located near Casino de Monte-Carlo. The casino offers a more casual gaming experience compared to its counterparts, with a relaxed atmosphere and a wide selection of games to choose from. Casino Café de Paris is open 24/7, making it a popular destination for night owls and late-night gamblers. The casino features a modern and stylish design, with bright lights and a contemporary décor. In addition to its gaming facilities, Casino Café de Paris also offers a bar and restaurant where guests can enjoy a meal or a drink while taking a break from the action. Whether you're a seasoned gambler or a casual player, Casino Café de Paris has something for everyone. Overall, Monaco's casinos offer a unique and unforgettable gaming experience in a luxurious and exclusive setting. Whether you're a high roller looking to place big bets or a casual player looking for some entertainment, Monaco's casinos are sure to satisfy your gambling desires. Reviews A bright, beautiful place, both inside and outside! Entrance to the casino is 18€. Near the casino you can admire a variety of machines! I highly recommend it for tourists to visit! William Johnson Perfect💖! The place is imbued with beauty and good mood! I didn’t notice the pathos, everything is taken for granted. We were there during the day, so there were no women in floor-length dresses and no men in suits, unfortunately. Entrance to the casino hall costs 18 euros, upon presentation of a passport, of which 10 euros can be spent at the bar (glass of wine, juice, cola) or in slot machines (a ticket with a bar code is inserted into the machine’s validator). It’s interesting to watch people’s excitement... In reality, we could have walked away with a big win at the top, but no one did that 😂 We didn’t win anything, but we were left with impressions and a good mood. recharged! I recommend! Emily Smith The area in front of the casino is very small, but very cozy. In its center there is a parabolic mirror, near which there is a constant queue of people who want to capture themselves in this mirror against the backdrop of the casino. Sophie Anderson Very cool place I immediately remember the films in which this casino was James Brown It’s nice, there are a lot of machines, there is a roulette and a couple of tables. There is a VIP room and a terrace for smoking players. pages.policy: Browsercasino | Stay informed about your privacy rights and how we handle your data on the "Privacy Policy" page of Browsercasino. 18+ +377-9-23643478 Time Browsercasino@gmail.com Contacts Reviews Monaco Privacy policy At Browsercasino, we understand the importance of protecting your personal information and we are committed to safeguarding your privacy when you visit our website. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information. By visiting or using our site, you accept the practices outlined in this policy. Information We Collect When you visit Browsercasino, we may collect certain information about you, including: Personal information: such as your name, email address, and any other information you voluntarily provide to us when submitting a contact form or signing up for our newsletter. Usage information: such as your IP address, device type, browser type, pages visited, and the time and date of your visit. Cookies: like many websites, we use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and track user preferences. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but this may affect the functionality of our site. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect from you in the following ways: To provide you with a personalized and enhanced browsing experience on our site. To communicate with you about updates, news, and promotional offers related to Browsercasino. To analyze and improve the performance of our website and services. To prevent fraud, enforce our Terms of Service, and comply with legal requirements. Disclosure of Your Information We may disclose your personal information to third parties in the following circumstances: With your consent: when you give us permission to share your information with a third party. Service providers: we may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us with website hosting, maintenance, and marketing efforts. Legal requirements: we may disclose your information in response to a court order, request from law enforcement, or other legal obligation. Data Security We take the security of your personal information seriously and have implemented measures to protect your data from loss, theft, and unauthorized access. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your information. Links to Third-Party Sites Browsercasino may contain links to third-party websites that are not operated or controlled by us. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these sites and encourage you to review their privacy policies before providing any personal information. Children's Privacy Browsercasino is intended for a general audience and is not directed at children under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect or store personal information from children, and if we become aware that we have inadvertently collected such information, we will promptly delete it. Changes to This Privacy Policy Browsercasino reserves the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the revised policy on our website. Your continued use of our site after the changes take effect constitutes your acceptance of the revised policy.
